wikipedia_page.main: Paul Andrew Campbell (born 1959) is a British entrepreneur and musician. He is the founder of amazing, the digital media brand, and CEO of Amazing Media, operator of amazingtunes.com and Amazing Radio.

response: * Paul Campbell (American actor) (1923–1999), American film actor
* Paul Campbell (Jamaican actor), Jamaican film and theatre actor
* Paul Campbell (first baseman) (1917–2006), American baseball player, manager and executive
* Paul Campbell (entrepreneur) (born 1959), British entrepreneur and musician
